#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t, n, arr[100], brr[100];
	int ans;
	cin >> t;
	for (int j = 1; j <= t; j++)
	{
		cin >> n;
		ans = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			cin >> arr[i];
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			cin >> brr[i];
		sort(arr, arr + n);
		sort(brr, brr + n);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			ans += abs(arr[i] - brr[i]);
		cout << "Case " << j << ": ";
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
